mapper.sql: id as id , userId as userId , type as type , typeId as typeId , universityId as universityId , universityName as universityName , achievement as achievement , lowestScore as lowestScore , averageScore as averageScore , status as status , creator as creator , createDate as createDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , lastModDate as lastModDate
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_forecast ( userId, type, typeId, universityId, universityName, achievement, lowestScore, averageScore, status, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{type}, #{typeId}, #{universityId}, #{universityName}, #{achievement}, #{lowestScore}, #{averageScore}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_forecast
userId = #{userId},
type = #{type},
typeId = #{typeId},
universityId = #{universityId},
universityName = #{universityName},
achievement = #{achievement},
lowestScore = #{lowestScore},
averageScore = #{averageScore},
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_forecast
userId = #{map.userId},
type = #{map.type},
typeId = #{map.typeId},
universityId = #{map.universityId},
universityName = #{map.universityName},
achievement = #{map.achievement},
lowestScore = #{map.lowestScore},
averageScore = #{map.averageScore},
status = #{map.status},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_forecast ( userId, type, typeId, universityId, universityName, achievement, lowestScore, averageScore, status, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate ) VALUES ( #{map.userId}, #{map.type}, #{map.typeId}, #{map.universityId}, #{map.universityName}, #{map.achievement}, #{map.lowestScore}, #{map.averageScore}, #{map.status}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, userId
, type
, typeId
, universityId
, universityName
, achievement
, lowestScore
, averageScore
, status
, creator
, createDate
, lastModifier
, lastModDate
FROM zgk_forecast
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND userId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.userId} , '%')
AND type like CONCAT('%', #{condition.type} , '%')
AND typeId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.typeId} , '%')
AND universityId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityId} , '%')
AND universityName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityName} , '%')
AND achievement like CONCAT('%', #{condition.achievement} , '%')
AND lowestScore like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lowestScore} , '%')
AND averageScore like CONCAT('%', #{condition.averageScore} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
